DialogueText.Text: Greetings my friend! Tell me, are you familiar with a place called the Vernal Pass?

It's a site that was once the home of some settlers who populated the Jungle some time ago. I've heard that they were exceptional botanists; masters of agriculture! There's some pretty strange rumors surrounding their fate...
I see! Then perhaps you're familiar with the rumors about what led to its inhabitants' disappearence?

Rumor has it that in their quest to bring about a new age of prosperity, they began to tamper with the power of souls; infusing countless numbers of them into a young sprout. Its said that the sprout then bloomed into a terrifying monster, and devoured the inhabitant!

A rather shocking conclusion, I know. If you ask me, I think the rumors don't have much a basis in reality. I think its more likely that they just came from old childrens' stories meant to teach kids about the folly of hubris. Though, if you're ever exploring the area, have a look around! Maybe you'll be able to prove me wrong, haha!
